text: Ivor Seward Richard, Baron Richard (30 May 1932 – 18 March 2018) was a British Labour Party politician. He served as a Member of Parliament from 1964 until 1974. He was also a member of the Commission of the European Communities and latterly sat as a life peer in the House of Lords. Richard died on 18 March 2018 at the age of 85.House of Lords - Deceased Lords ==References== ==Other websites== *Debrett's People of Today *Richard Commission *Richard Commission final report Category:1932 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Welsh politicians Category:People from Carmarthenshire Category:Labour Life Peers Category:UK MPs 1964–1966 Category:UK MPs 1966–1970 Category:UK MPs 1970–1974
title: Ivor Richard, Baron Richard
